title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Skills: Physiology Team-Based Learning (TBL) Course for Clinical Application

context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Through team-based collaborative activities, learners can explain core concepts of human physiology (cellular physiology, homeostasis, metabolic regulation, etc.) with over 80% accuracy
Learners analyze clinical scenarios to establish problem-solving strategies that apply physiological principles to real-world cases (diabetes, hypertension, etc.)
Using digital collaboration tools, learners share knowledge and provide feedback with team members, achieving over 4 points (on a 5-point scale) in teamwork evaluation surveys
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
